name: DJ Kat Scratch
description:
A little project made by me in about a month. 

You're a DJ cat that catnapped a little too long, and now you might be late for your show! Avoid the dogs and humans that try to stop you and keep your DJ rep in tact!

Thank you for playing!

How-To-Play:

  • Move with the left and right arrow keys
  • Jump with the up arrow
  • Look down with the down arrow
  • Shoot a hairball with the spacebar

Credits:

Pixel art by me.

Full credit to these lovely people for making the awesome music and SFX featured:

  • BGM: Pixel Adventures by Marcelo Fernandez - http://www.marcelofernandezmusic.com
  • Win Music: Electro Opening Theme by Cleyton Kauffman - https://soundcloud.com/cleytonkauffman
  • Projectile and enemy defeat SFX by Shade - https://soundcloud.com/noshades
  • Player defeat SFX by Josepharaoh99
